device.label: XBee Sensor
device.description:
Digi Light, Temperature and Humidity (if present) XBee Sensor.
Notice this is not the XBee Watchport device.

setting.label: XBee Device Manager
setting.tooltip: Must be set to the name of an XBeeDeviceManager instance.

setting.label: MAC Address
setting.tooltip: The extended address of the XBee Sensor device you would like to monitor.

setting.label: Sleep
setting.tooltip: Determines if we should put the device to sleep between samples.

setting.label: Sample rate
setting.tooltip: The sample rate of the XBee adapter in milliseconds.

setting.label: Awake time
setting.tooltip: How long, in milliseconds, should the sensor stay awake after taking a sample.

setting.label: Sample pre-delay
setting.tooltip: Determines how long, in milliseconds, should the device remain awake after waking from sleep.

setting.label: Force humidity presence
setting.tooltip: Force a sensor which has not been detected to have humidity capability to having humidity capability present. Writes the devices DD device-type value as a side effect so that it will report itself as having humidity capability in the future.
